path.description: Path to be used for changing inheritance

state.description: Specify whether to enable I(present) or disable I(absent) ACL inheritance

reorganize.description: For P(state) = I(absent), indicates if the inherited ACE's should be copied from the parent directory. This is necessary (in combination with removal) for a simple ACL instead of using multiple ACE deny entries. For P(state) = I(present), indicates if the inherited ACE's should be deduplicated compared to the parent directory. This removes complexity of the ACL structure.
